smg.text: Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Light rain at first. Force 3 to 4 easterly winds.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Mist in the morning and at night. Force 2 to 3 east to southeasterly winds.
Mainly cloudy. Mist. A few rain patches. Light winds.
Temperature falling significantly. Cloudy apart from sunny intervals. Mist at first. Light winds, becoming force 4 to 5 northerly winds with gusts.
Cold and dry. Mainly fine. Force 3 to 5 north to northeasterly winds with gusts.
Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 east to northeasterly winds with gusts.
